reviews.author: Google User
reviews.text: This place is 10/10. This cafe is cute, vibrant and cozy.

reviews.author: Customer Review
reviews.text: Possibly the best banh mi! Cool coffee and food choices with affordable prices. They also have books, board games or you can bring your own book.

reviews.author: Restaurant Patron
reviews.text: The cozy atmosphere allows you to relax after a hard working day. Great matcha latte and cappuccino. The staff is terrific!

highlights: Nicely cooked sandwiches, bao and dumplings
